review: I love my chromecast, interested in trying roku to see what its all about but this thing is amazing. paired with the android and a few apps known as Show Box ( great free app to stream TONS of movies and shows even latest releases and episodes) and an app called Local Cast ( streams those shows on that app or anywhere in the internet to your tv with the chrome cast) it has been a blessing for a room without anything but a dvd player previously. It gave us some trouble to setup a few times when it should just be easy but i credit that to my Belkin N150 dated router. sometimes i have to reset the router (quite frequently on first connection of the session between cast and device) but thats the only complaint. thanks
author: michael

review: Easy to setup. Would be great to see support for more movie formats (especially popular AVI format) on Google Chrome as well as generally improved support for casting non-chrome applications.
author: Kal El

review: Worked for one day, then stopped syncing
author: C. Lin "The Perspicacious"
